interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sand & Sky Face Roller & Massager Tool. Aussie Skincare Essentials Firming Face Roller, Sculpt, Sooth & Contour to Banish Puffiness and Boost Serum Absorption.
Review Date: 2021/06/25
Store: Sand & Sky
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.19 x 6.46 x 2.95 inches; 9.35 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Sand & Sky'}
Review Text: This is a fun tool! I already use jade rollers and gua sha and all that good stuff so I was excited to try this facial roller. I use it after applying serum to really help it absorb. It feels amazing! The metal feels cold on my face and it's just fun to use. It helps wake me up in the morning and feels great, like I'm doing something luxurious. It's easy to glide across the face and you can just rinse it off when you are done. A nice tool and I enjoy using it.
Review Title: Soothing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
C.O. Bigelow No. 007 Dr Hiosous Quince Hand Lotion, 4 Ounces
C. O. Bigelow
{'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '4 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 2 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '20002240'}
This is a nice hand cream. The tube is a generous size. I've used C.O. Bigelow products in the past and have always enjoyed them so I was interested in trying this hand cream. It's very moisturizing! I usually use it after washing my hands or if I wake up in the night with dry hands from air conditioning. It's not so thick that it's hard to get out of the tube, and it's not very greasy, but still feels really good and moisturizing, taking a minute to really absorb. The smell is great! I wasn't really familiar with the scent of quince before. All I knew about it was that it was a fruit. The smell is really nice, I don't even know how to describe it! Subtly fruity, maybe a little spicy too, definitely enjoyable! This is a great product and will last a long time.
Lovely!
EltaMD Skin Recovery Essence Hydrating Toner for Face, Face Toner for Oily Skin and Sensitive Skin, Alcohol Free Formula, Helps Detoxify and Hydrate Skin, pH Balanced, Oil Free, 7.3 oz Bottle
{'Brand': 'EltaMD', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'EltaMD Skin Recovery Toner helps to repair damaged skin, calms skin and helps to minimize the risk of irritation.EltaMD Skin Recovery Toner helps to repair damaged skin, calms skin and helps to minimize the risk of irritation.  See more', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Professional Skin Care', 'Product Dimensions': '1.19 x 1.19 x 6.31 inches; 7.3 Ounces', 'Item model number': '090205077518', 'UPC': '090205077518', 'Manufacturer': 'EltaMD', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
This is a nice toner. It gently tones the skin after cleansing. It leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized, not tight or dry. I'm looking forward to using it more along with other products from Elta MD. It feels gentle on my skin, which is especially nice as it gets drier during the winter months. The bottle is a nice large size as well, so it is a good value.
Soothes my skin

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Strong inclination towards moisturizing hand lotions, hydrating facial products, and innovative skincare tools that enhance routine effectiveness and comfort.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Established preference for C.O. Bigelow with positive experiences concerning EltaMD, showing openness to exploring new brands and products that align with skincare needs.
- **Texture Preference:** Prefers lotions and toners that are light, non-greasy, and absorb well, leaving skin soft and hydrated without any residue.
- **Usage Habits:** Regularly incorporates hand creams, facial toners, and additional skincare tools into their routine, especially after cleansing or in response to dryness from environmental factors, particularly during colder months.
- **Fragrance Appreciation:** Enjoys subtly fruity and unique scents, with a keen interest in experimenting with diverse fragrances within both hand and facial care products.
- **Skincare Routine Enhancement:** Recently introduced a facial roller into their regimen, enhancing serum absorption and providing a soothing, luxurious experience during application.
- **Overall Sentiment:** Tends to rate products highly, emphasizing quality, personal experience, and the soothing benefits for skin, particularly for sensitive or dry skin.

The user demonstrates a consistent appreciation for effective and enjoyable skincare solutions, prioritizing comfort, hydration, and a gentle application, while also embracing innovative tools to enhance their skincare routine.
